price: A onome ko bude vjerovao i dobra djela činio pripada nagrada najljepša, i s njime ćemo blago postupiti.”
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man āmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan falahu jazāan al-ḥus'nā wasanaqūlu lahu min amrinā yus'ran
